Psycasts40k.PsykerPathDef.label: sanctioned psyker
Psycasts40k.PsykerPathDef.description: Sanctioned psykers possess a rare willpower to control their abilities and not become a danger to others.

Psycasts40k.PsykerPathDef.label: chaos psyker
Psycasts40k.PsykerPathDef.description: Chaos psykers possess unhinged psychic prowess and is capable of various tasks such as summoning Daemons and unleashing devastating weaponised psychic powers upon the enemy.
